title: The application of water bamboo (Zizania latifolia) husk-derived biochar for copper-contaminated irrigation water treatment and soil amendment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00342J, Paper
Thi-Manh Nguyen, Hung-Hsiang Chen, Chih-Chi Yang, Yung-Pin Tsai, Ming-Yu Kuo, Yi-Tang Liao, Yu-Chen Chang, Ku-Fan Chen
Biochar prepared from water bamboo husks can be used for water purification and soil acidification amendment to safeguard agricultural soil and increase crop yields in Taiwan.
